questionTitle: I arrived at the school ten minutes late. I wish I ................ the bus instead of riding my bicycle.
In China an ancient medical treatment  .............. as acupuncture is sometimes used during surgery.
Acupuncture is ........... by .............. needles into various parts of the body.
He's not very sensible as far as money ...................... are concerned .
The firm went bankrupt and their shares became ......................
She ...................... $20 out of bank every Monday.
There is nothing to ..................... in this place.
The reinforcements were .......................... to the front.
The headmaster ...................... the discipline problem in his school with growing concern.
"If you can't lend me the money. I think I'll ask Fred". "Don't bother. He has .............. than I do ".
"What do you like for your birthday?" " .................... will do."
If there .............. no floods last year, the crop ............. better now.
It is imperative that this letter ........... immediately.
They looked very .............. when they came to see us last night.
Mr. Hill is ............. to need a doctor.
The size of the audience, ............. we had expected, was well over twenty thousand .
If you hurry, you will overtake him. He has only just left here and ............... far.
"Think of yourself, if not of ......................" "Thanks, but I don't see any other way out".
The girl you ..................... yesterday is waiting for you in the drawing room.
The ...................... thought of exams makes her feel ill.
